ygData.subject: Re: fun with charm
ygData.msgSnippet: I think most creatures can hit magical? ... From: Brewhaus [mailto:brewhaus@rocketmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 1:16 PM To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I think most creatures can hit magical?

-----Original Message-----
From: Brewhaus [mailto:brewhaus@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 1:16 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] fun with charm


From: Brewhaus <brewhaus@...>

>
> > How long do things
> > usually stay charmed?
>
> Sometimes as little as a few seconds, other times it
> can last several minutes, enough to fight one or two
> fights.

How about this. If you charm a magical being, like a wisp, than have it
attack, would the thing it is fighting be able to hit it? This could be
used to take on much higher level creatures that couldn't hit magical.
Might be a sort of cheat. I don't know.

Aarreran
Ad Infinitvm
Mithaniel Marr
